alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 28 at 2:34PM MDT until further notice by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City UT has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Utah... East Canyon Creek Near Jeremy Ranch downstream to Echo Reservoir affecting Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Back zones. .Warm temperatures will significantly increase snowmelt leading to rising river flows. For the Weber River...including Jeremy Ranch downstream to Echo Reservoir...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...East Canyon Creek Near Jeremy Ranch downstream to Echo Reservoir. * WHEN...From Saturday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 8.1 feet, minor flooding is expected along East Canyon Creek from Jeremy Ranch downstream to East Canyon Reservoir. Minor inundation is expected at the Jeremy Ranch Golf Course and areas adjacent to the creek downstream. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM MDT Friday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached as early as Saturday evening. Peak flows are forecast to occur Monday night into Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.1 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1100 AM MDT.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
